p: Regarding the formulations, the inactivated whole virus Sinovac vaccine is composed of one isolate of Sars-CoV2 (CN2) obtained from a patient of China and Alum adjuvant ( 40), while the Chadox1 nCoV19 vaccine of Oxford is composed of a Chimpanzee recombinant adenovirus, which expresses the S protein of SARS-Cov2 ( 39).
